config.author: PuzzWorks / Ali Vahed, enhanced by Grok
config.description: Comprehensive adaptive question bank for PuzzWorks AI Assistant (Jerry), covering cognitive, executive function, social-emotional, creative, and motor skills for children aged 5–12.

difficulty_criteria.5: Advanced problem-solving, multi-step with high cognitive load

sections.name: strengths
sections.description: Skills with accuracy ≥ 85% and low hint usage

sections.name: growth_areas
sections.description: Skills with accuracy 55–84% or high hint usage

examples.Memory: Memory card games, sequence recall apps

examples.Pattern Recognition: Encourage finding patterns in daily routines (e.g., days of the week).
examples.Memory: Play memory card games at home.
examples.Fine Motor Skills: Practice cutting paper or drawing shapes.

mode_trigger.social_emotional: detected negative sentiment, frustration spikes, or low engagement (long latency/rapid guessing)
mode_trigger.celebratory: detected positive sentiment, three consecutive correct answers

actions: return to main rotation with −1 difficulty

developmental_anchors.executive_function_stages: Harvard Center on the Developing Child – Executive Function (developmental stages overview)

rubrics.self_explanation: Score clarity, correctness, strategy awareness (0–3 each)

adaptive_stimuli_rules.recurrence_policy: If mastery < threshold or last_seen > decay_days, schedule earlier in rotation.

evidence_sources.name: Harvard Center on the Developing Child – Executive Function
AOTA (2023) – Occupational Therapy guidance on motor/sensory integration
